name: Poo Splash
description:
Poo Splash - OMG Flush Now!

The super hit game "Poo Splash" is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!


Switch and match your way through unlimited levels in this addictive puzzle adventure.


Poo Splash features:

● Cute graphics that will leave you hungry for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● unlimited levels
● Leaderboards for you and your friends
● Items to unlock by completing levels
● Boosters to help with those challenging levels
● Seamless synchronization with the Facebook version
